00014 #ifndef PAL_MACHINETYPES_H
00015 #define PAL_MACHINETYPES_H
00016 
00017 /*
00018  *   This file contains the machine specific type defines that are
00019  *   necessary for consistent data type size and sign. Classes that
00020  *   are to be exported as part of the external API will need to have
00021  *   their types defined here.
00022  */
00023 
00024 #if (defined _WIN32_WCE)
00025 
00026 // Microsoft workaround
00027 #ifdef RGB
00028 #undef RGB
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 /* Arch Data Types for Win32 Platform */
00032 
00033 #define WFAPI_IOSTREAM_AVAILABLE
00034 
00035 /* integer types */
00036 namespace pal {
00037 
00038 typedef char wf_char;
00039 typedef char wf_int8;
00040 typedef unsigned char wf_uint8;
00041 typedef unsigned short wf_uint16; 
00042 typedef signed short wf_int16; 
00043 typedef unsigned int wf_uint32; 
00044 typedef int wf_int32; 
00045 typedef unsigned __int64 wf_uint64; 
00046 typedef __int64 wf_int64; 
00047 typedef unsigned int wf_uint;
00048 typedef int wf_int;
00049 typedef void (*wf_dealloc_func)(void*);
00050 typedef void* (*wf_alloc_func)(size_t);
00051    
00052 /* floating-point types */
00053 typedef float wf_float32; 
00054 typedef double wf_float64; 
00055 
00056 static const wf_uint8 WF_MAX_UINT8 = wf_uint8(-1);
00057 static const wf_uint16 WF_MAX_UINT16 = wf_uint16(-1);
00058 static const wf_int32 WF_MIN_INT32 = wf_int32(0x80000000);
00059 static const wf_int32 WF_MAX_INT32 = wf_int32(0x7fffffff);
00060 static const wf_uint32 WF_MAX_UINT32 = wf_uint32(-1);
00061 static const wf_int64 WF_MAX_INT64 = 0x7fffffffffffffffLL;
00062 static const wf_int64 WF_MIN_INT64 = (-WF_MAX_INT64 - 1LL);
00063 
00064 }
00065 
00066 #elif (defined __SYMBIAN32__)
00068 
00069    #include <e32def.h>
00070 
00071    namespace pal {
00072    typedef char wf_char;
00073    typedef TUint8 wf_uint8;
00075    typedef TReal32 wf_float32;
00076    typedef TReal64 wf_float64;
00077    
00078    typedef TInt32 wf_int32;
00079    typedef TInt64 wf_int64;
00080    typedef TInt32 wf_int;
00081    typedef TUint16 wf_uint16;
00082    typedef TUint32 wf_uint32;
00083    typedef TUint32 wf_uint;
00084 
00085    typedef void (*wf_dealloc_func)(void*);
00086    typedef void* (*wf_alloc_func)(unsigned int);
00087    
00088    static const wf_uint8 WF_MAX_UINT8 = wf_uint8(-1);
00089    static const wf_uint16 WF_MAX_UINT16 = wf_uint16(-1);
00090    static const wf_int32 WF_MIN_INT32 = wf_int32(0x80000000);
00091    static const wf_int32 WF_MAX_INT32 = wf_int32(0x7fffffff);
00092    static const wf_uint32 WF_MAX_UINT32 = wf_uint32(-1);
00093    static const wf_int64 WF_MAX_INT64 = 0x7fffffffffffffffLL;
00094    static const wf_int64 WF_MIN_INT64 = (-WF_MAX_INT64 - 1LL);
00095 
00096    } // End of namespace pal
00097 
00098 #elif defined(__unix__) || defined(__MACH__)
00099    // For linux/unix specific types.
00100 
00101    #define WFAPI_IOSTREAM_AVAILABLE
00102 #ifndef __STDC_LIMIT_MACROS
00103    #define __STDC_LIMIT_MACROS
00104 #endif
00105 
00106    #include <stdint.h>
00107    #include <limits.h>
00108    // Defines NULL
00109    #include <stdio.h>
00110    
00111    // Get the format macros from inttypes.
00112    #ifndef  __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS
00113      #define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS
00114    #endif
00115    #include  <inttypes.h>
00116 
00120    namespace pal {
00121    
00123    typedef short int    wf_int16;
00125    typedef int  wf_int32;
00127    typedef long long int wf_int64;
00129    typedef int  wf_int;
00131    typedef char wf_char;
00133    typedef unsigned char wf_uint8;
00135    typedef unsigned short int   wf_uint16;
00137    typedef unsigned int wf_uint32;
00139    typedef unsigned long long int wf_uint64;
00141    typedef unsigned int wf_uint;
00143    typedef float wf_float32;
00145    typedef double wf_float64;
00146 
00147    static const wf_uint8 WF_MAX_UINT8 = wf_uint8(-1);
00148    static const wf_uint16 WF_MAX_UINT16 = wf_uint16(-1);
00149    static const wf_int32 WF_MIN_INT32 = INT_MIN;
00150    static const wf_int32 WF_MAX_INT32 = INT_MAX;
00151    static const wf_uint32 WF_MAX_UINT32 = wf_uint32(-1);
00152    static const wf_int64 WF_MAX_INT64 = 0x7fffffffffffffffLL;
00153    static const wf_int64 WF_MIN_INT64 = (-WF_MAX_INT64 - 1LL);
00154    static const wf_uint64 WF_MAX_UINT64 = wf_uint64(-1);
00155 
00156    typedef void (*wf_dealloc_func)(void*);
00157    typedef void* (*wf_alloc_func)(size_t);
00158    
00159    } // End of namespace pal
00160 #endif
00161 
00162 namespace WFAPI {
00163 using namespace pal;
00164 }
00165 
00166 
00167 #endif // PAL_MACHINETYPES_H
